title: Allan Breck.
author: Gleig, G. R.
snippet: Ever since she became acquaint wi' poor Blairlogie' s fate, she's been a'maist as distracted as she was when his gallant brother suffered — wandering about by night, and wrastlino- wi' sorrow, that, I 'm feared, may prove in the end ower strong for her.

title: Braes o' Balquhidder. A novel
author: Aytoun, Douglas.
snippet: Ascending to the top, an excellent view—the daybeing most favourable—was obtained of the Ochil hills,Blairlogie, Alva, Tillicoultry, and Dollar; also the links
